job.title: Expert ASP.net dev wanted.
job.description:
As an ASP Developer, you will be responsible for developing and maintaining web applications using ASP.NET technologies. You will work closely with a team of developers, designers, and project managers to deliver high-quality, scalable, and secure web solutions. Your expertise in ASP.NET will be vital in designing, coding, testing, debugging, and deploying web applications that meet the needs and expectations of our clients and end-users.

Responsibilities:

Design, develop, and maintain web applications using ASP.NET, C#, and other related technologies.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather requirements, analyze user needs, and propose technical solutions.
Participate in the full software development lifecycle, including requirements analysis, design, development, testing, and deployment.
Write clean, efficient, and maintainable code following best practices and coding standards.
Debug and resolve technical issues, ensuring the performance, reliability, and security of the applications.
Optimize web applications for maximum speed, scalability, and responsiveness.
Conduct thorough testing of developed applications to identify and fix any bugs or usability issues.
Keep up-to-date with the latest industry trends, technologies, and best practices in ASP.NET development.
Collaborate with team members to review and provide constructive feedback on code and architectural designs.
Assist in the documentation of technical specifications, user guides, and other project-related documentation.
Requirements:

Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field (or equivalent work experience).
Proven experience as an ASP.NET developer, working with C# and ASP.NET MVC or Web Forms.
Strong understanding of web development concepts, including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and responsive design principles.
Proficiency in database technologies such as SQL Server, MySQL, or Oracle.
Familiarity with front-end frameworks/libraries (e.g., jQuery, Bootstrap) and experience in integrating them with ASP.NET applications.
Solid knowledge of object-oriented programming (OOP) principles and design patterns.
Experience with version control systems (e.g., Git) and Agile/Scrum methodologies.
Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to debug and troubleshoot issues efficiently.
Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively in a team environment.
Detail-oriented with a focus on delivering high-quality, reliable, and scalable web applications.
Familiarity with cloud platforms (e.g., Microsoft Azure, AWS) and knowledge of microservices architecture is a plus.
